Explainer: What is the space-based nuclear weapon the US says Russia is developing?What is the space-based nuclear weapon that the United States has warned Congress and allies in Europe that Russia could use against the West's satellites? Polish farmers pelt EU office with eggs in western cityPolish farmers set off flares and firecrackers and pelted a European Commission office with eggs in the western city of Wroclaw on Thursday, the state news agency PAP reported, and organisers quickly tried to break up the protest. North Korea leader's sister says Japan PM's comments positive - KCNAThe influential sister of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said there is no impediment to closer ties with Japan and there may come a day Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida visits Pyongyang, state news agency KCNA said on Thursday. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 12:01:53 GMT 65QLAEEJ7ZNKNJIZZWRJJ3ZOCA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-leaders-sister-says-japan-pms-comments-positive-kcna-2024-02-15/Reuters世界亚太地区
Swedish prosecutors turn down request to reopen 'Estonia' ferry disaster caseSwedish prosecutors said on Thursday they had turned down a request to reopen investigations into the sinking of the "Estonia" ferry in 1994 with the loss of 852 lives, as there was no new evidence to suggest a collision, an explosion or a crime. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 11:56:56 GMT 3M6WT7JBS5OBNGQRSHZX4AEKGA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swedish-prosecutors-turn-down-request-reopen-estonia-ferry-disaster-case-2024-02-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Cold snap expected in China as millions return from Lunar New Year tripsA cold snap is forecast to sweep across many parts of China from this weekend, with temperatures falling by up to 20 degrees Celsius as millions return from Lunar New Year trips, the national observatory said on Thursday. Ukraine needs $486 bln to recover, rebuild after nearly two years of war - World BankRebuilding Ukraine's economy after Russia's invasion nearly two years ago is expected to cost $486 billion, 2.8 times its 2023 expected economic output, a new study by the World Bank, United Nations, European Commission and the Ukrainian government found. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 11:45:26 GMT I4GRAJ3VTJNQFEEAJQAK5BLFRQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-needs-486-bln-recover-rebuild-after-nearly-two-years-war-world-bank-2024-02-15/Andrea Shalal世界欧洲

Ukraine says it is withdrawing some troops in Avdiivka to more secure positionsUkraine is conducting a manoeuvre in some areas of the embattled town of Avdiivka to withdraw troops to "more advantageous positions" and in other places is trying to push out Russian troops, military spokesman Dmytro Lykhoviy said on Thursday.
